column4: hi all.... i'v recently installed picasa...it seems to have installed wine in it tooo... is there any risk of getting infected windows viruses? i know win viruses wont affect me... but will i get them?
why you should get some when you use picasa?
hm when you download viruses maybe, but I don't guess that picase has viruses...
there won't be viruses only with wine.
sure if you get an .exe which deletes all your data it will be whereever it has writepermissions :)
do not go on pronsites and else. ;)
